meaningMnemonic:
An <kanji>author</kanji> <kanji>make</kanji>s <vocabulary>writing</vocabulary> in an activity known as <vocabulary>authorship</vocabulary>.

Note that this word isn't a general term for writing! 著作 has a more specific nuance — it's mostly used to talk about a work or the writings of a particular author.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
